episode.title: Cariboo Signals - Wild Spaces & Outdoor Life
episode.description:
Riley and Casey explore technology and society in rural communities. Today's focus: Wild Spaces & Outdoor Life.

NEWS ROUNDUP: We break down [GN Clean Energy and EVs] Hanwha and Morrison’s Chrysalis partner for 3.5GW of solar and storage in North America and [GN Clean Energy and EVs] Electrify everything, plus 1 more stories, and explore what these developments mean for communities like ours.

RURAL CONNECTIONS: Deep dive into wild spaces & outdoor life, discussing how rural and remote communities can thoughtfully adopt and adapt emerging technologies.

Hosts: Riley (Tech systems thinker with rural roots) and Casey (Community development focus).
